rules_text: [i]Unreal[/i] – This spell deals 2 damage to any target. Instead it deals 3 damage to that target if a permanent phased in or was created under your control this turn.
flavor_text: [i]The word [/i]bard[i] ordinarily puts folk in mind of those itinerant minstrels, but many are oft to forget how nimble of finger they can be.[/i]
